The owner of this Special Skill is the next in line in the command echelon to the Team Leader of a Fireteam, being able to replace him if necessary during combat operations.

{{css_skillbox |black| NUMBER 2 | AUTOMATIC SKILL }}
{{skill-label | Optional }}
{{requirements}}
* The user must be part of a [[Fireteam]].
* The Fireteam Leader of that Fireteam enters [[Isolated State]] or any [[Null]] State
{{effects}}
* The user may automatically become the new Fireteam Leader of his Fireteam, placing the Fireteam Leader Token beside him.
* Even if the Fireteam Team Leader recovers from their Isolated or Null State, the Number 2 Trooper will continue to be the Fireteam Leader until the player decides otherwise.
{{css_skillbox-end}}
